forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 18C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 64F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 20C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 66F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 62F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by some light rain later in the day. High around 20C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning will give way to cloudy skies and light rain during the afternoon. High 67F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low near 10C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 49F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High around 15C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 59F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 47F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 16C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. Low near 50F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 62F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
